      Type Narrowing

      function a(x: number | string) {
  if (typeof x === 'string') {
    return x + '1';
  } else {
    return x + 1;
  }
}

      Type Assertion

      function a(x: number | string) {
  let array: number[] = [];
  array[0] = x as number;
}
